attributes.action: Ensure the safe return of the 15 British Sailors and Marines detained in Tehran by any means necessary.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe that the current stand off between the UK and Iran shows inherant weakness in the British stand point and that a quick and if necessary military solution should be sought.  We are more than well aware of the political situation surrounding this unfortunate turn of events, HOWEVER... we are dealing with a Regime not known for it's compliance with international law and basic human rights.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
